Topic.Title: only certain foods should be allowed on food stamp cards

Message.Msg: Hamburger but not steak? Nice logic.
Do yourself a favor and buy SODA
at least someone is buying lol

Topic.Title: only certain foods should be allowed on food stamp cards

Message.Msg: Outstanding comment! I totally agree with your point of view! I cannot tell you how many times I have seen people with the latest iPhones (complete with expensive data plans) pay for Red Bull energy drinks at convenience stores with their EBT cards while hardworking people work two jobs to make ends meet. Financial assistance is fine (for a short periodof time) for those who truly need it - no one should ever go hungry in this country; however, families who have been on it for generations and eat out at fast-food restaurants should be weaned off public support as it merely enables continued bad behavior!

Topic.Title: only certain foods should be allowed on food stamp cards

Message.Msg: Love seeing people pay for food at 7-11 with their EBT then buy $20 in lotto with cash.
